attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
With the Prime Minister's imminent resignation from office, 
and the Chancellor, Gordon Brown waiting to step in as an
unelected leader, we the people of the United Kingdom, call
for a general election to be held to coincide with the PMs
departure, giving the British public the chance to vote on if
we want the present government to continue in office under 
an unelected Prime Minister.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
